dublin_core.dcvalue: A panel of international experts in the field of diabetes and diabetes technology met in Oslo Norway for the 11th Annual Symposium on Self Monitoring of Blood Glucose The goal of these meetings is to share current knowledge facilitate new collaborations and encourage further research projects that can improve the lives of people with diabetes The 2018 meeting comprised a comprehensive scientific program and four keynote lectures
11th Annual Symposium on Self-Monitoring of Blood Glucose: April 12-14, 2018, Oslo, Norway.
